snippet: Four militants loyal to the Islamic State attacked a prison on Friday inside the air base that serves as the only working airport for Tripoli.
abstract: Four militants loyal to Islamic State claim responsibility for attack on prison inside air base in Tripoli, Libya; government confirms attack on base, which is only functioning airport in city, and says militia on base rebuffed assault.
lead_paragraph: Four militants loyal to the Islamic State attacked a prison on Friday inside the air base that serves as the only working airport for Tripoli.

headline.main: ISIS Group Attacks Prison in Libya
headline.print_headline: ISIS Group Attacks Prison in Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
